properties.displayName: [Initiative] CIS - CCE-38235-8 - Machine inactivity limit' is set to '900 or fewer second(s), but not 0
properties.description: Windows notices inactivity of a logon session, and if the amount of inactive time exceeds the inactivity limit, then the screen saver will run, locking the session.The recommended state for this setting is: 900 or fewer second(s), but not 0.
